text: "Hello Franco Ccapa, it's a pleasure to meet you. How's going on?"

"I'm glad you're here today, and thanks for your interest in our company. I'm excited to learn more about your background. I'll be conducting your screening interview today. It will take around 15 minutes. We'll cover your experience, skills, expectations, and give you a quick overview of the role. Feel free to ask questions at any point. Are you ok with that?"

"Perfect! Let me give you a bit of context. In this role, you'd be working on developing a personalized product recommendation system for our e-commerce platform, using technologies such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-learn. You'd be collaborating with engineers to optimize recommendation models and deliver scalable, production-ready systems. Do you have any question so far?"

"ok, continuing with the interview I have 10 predefined questions for you. Please answer honestly and clearly â€” there's no need to be perfect. Just trust on you, you can do it. Are you ready, Franco Ccapa?"

"Perfect! I'd love to hear more about you in a short speech. Please introduce yourself. You can take around 1 minute and include your current role, experience, and what interests you about this opportunity at TechCorp Solutions."
"Can you tell me about a recent machine learning project you've worked on? What was your role, and what were the outcomes?"
"Which tools or ML frameworks are you most comfortable with? Do you have experience with technologies like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-learn?"
"Have you worked with cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure? What kinds of tasks did you use them for?"
"Tell me about a time you worked with large-scale datasets. How did you manage the volume, and what tools did you use?"
"Have you ever deployed an ML model into production? What did the process look like, and did you face any challenges?"
"How do you usually collaborate with cross-functional teams like data engineers or backend developers?"

"Why are you interested in this specific role? What attracts you about Developing and deploying machine learning models to improve the accuracy of customer segmentation and predictive analytics for our clients?"
"When would you be available to start if selected?"
"The expected salary range for this role is $120,000 - $180,000. Does this match your expectations?"
"We're finishing the interview. Is there anything you'd like to ask at this moment?"

"Thank you for your time, Franco Ccapa. It was a pleasure learning about you. This concludes the screening for the ML Engineer position at TechCorp Solutions. You'll hear from us in the next few days with information about the next step. Have a great rest of your day!"
